name: Deals For Schools LLC
overview:
We are a complete online experience for schools and other organizations to earn money. We offer daily deals in over 52 markets, online shopping with over 1700 participating merchants and travel with our partnership with Priceline.

All schools or other organizations have to do is visit our website and sign up. We then provide all marketing materials such as post cards, email letters and badges for their websites.

We also provide a plug in for the parents to download in which they create an account. Once the download is completed it will track all of their purchase they make online and their school will automatically receive cash back. Its that easy!
